mapper.select: SELECT AUCTIONID, BOOKID, STARTPRICE, PRESENTPRICE, SALESNUMBER, BIDNUMBER, ENDTIME FROM AUCTION WHERE BOOKID = #{bookId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT book_seq.nextval AS bookId FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BOOK (BOOKID, USERID, IMAGEURL, NAME, AUTHOR, PUBLISHER, PUBLICATIONDATE, PRICE, CONDITION, DETAIL) VALUES (#{bookId}, #{userId}, #{imageUrl}, #{name}, #{author}, #{publisher}, #{date}, #{price}, #{condition}, #{detail})

SELECT sale_seq.nextval AS saleId FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SALE (SALEID, SUGGESTPRICE, BOOKID) VALUES (#{saleId}, #{suggestPrice}, #{book.bookId})

SELECT auction_seq.nextval AS auctionId FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO AUCTION (AUCTIONID, STARTPRICE, SALESNUMBER, ENDTIME, PRESENTPRICE, BIDNUMBER, STATUS, BOOKID) VALUES (#{auctionId}, #{startPrice}, #{salesNumber}, #{endTime}, #{presentPrice}, #{bidNumber}, #{status}, #{book.bookId})

SELECT share_seq.nextval AS shareId FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SHARING (SHAREID, SHARENUMBER, ENDTIME, RAFFLETIME, PEOPLENUMBER, STATUS, BOOKID) VALUES (#{shareId}, #{shareNumber}, #{endTime}, #{raffleTime}, #{peopleNumber}, #{status}, #{book.bookId})
mapper.select: SELECT s.saleId AS saleId, s.suggestPrice AS suggestPrice, b.name AS "book.name", b.price AS "book.price", b.author AS "book.author", b.condition AS "book.condition", b.imageUrl AS "book.imageUrl" FROM Sale s, Book b WHERE s.bookId = b.bookId

SELECT a.auctionId AS auctionId, a.presentPrice AS presentPrice, a.bidNumber AS bidNumber, a.endTime AS endTime, b.name AS "book.name", b.author AS "book.author", b.condition AS "book.condition", b.imageUrl AS "book.imageUrl" FROM Auction a, Book b WHERE a.bookId = b.bookId

SELECT s.shareId AS shareId, s.shareNumber AS shareNumber, s.peopleNumber AS peopleNumber, s.endTime AS endTime, s.raffleTime AS raffleTime, b.name AS "book.name", b.author AS "book.author", b.condition AS "book.condition", b.imageUrl AS "book.imageUrl" FROM Sharing s, Book b WHERE s.bookId = b.bookId

SELECT s.saleId AS saleId, s.suggestPrice AS suggestPrice, b.bookId AS "book.bookId", b.userId AS "book.userId", b.name AS "book.name", b.author AS "book.author", b.condition AS "book.condition", b.imageUrl AS "book.imageUrl", b.publisher AS "book.publisher", b.publicationDate AS "book.date", b.price AS "book.price", b.detail AS "book.detail" FROM Sale s, Book b WHERE s.bookId = b.bookId AND s.saleId = ${value}

SELECT a.auctionId AS auctionId, a.startPrice AS startPrice, a.presentPrice AS presentPrice, a.salesNumber AS salesNumber, a.bidNumber AS bidNumber, a.endTime AS endTime, b.bookId AS "book.bookId", b.userId AS "book.userId", b.name AS "book.name", b.author AS "book.author", b.condition AS "book.condition", b.imageUrl AS "book.imageUrl", b.publisher AS "book.publisher", b.publicationDate AS "book.date", b.price AS "book.price", b.detail AS "book.detail" FROM Auction a, Book b WHERE a.bookId = b.bookId AND a.auctionId = ${value}

SELECT s.shareId AS shareId, s.shareNumber AS shareNumber, s.endTime AS endTime, s.raffleTime AS raffleTime, s.peopleNumber AS peopleNumber, b.bookId AS "book.bookId", b.userId AS "book.userId", b.name AS "book.name", b.author AS "book.author", b.condition AS "book.condition", b.imageUrl AS "book.imageUrl", b.publisher AS "book.publisher", b.publicationDate AS "book.date", b.price AS "book.price", b.detail AS "book.detail" FROM Sharing s, Book b WHERE s.bookId = b.bookId AND s.shareId = ${value}
